name: MP_ Decoder
short_description:
Decoding MP_ files with are "broken".

Application can work eaither with one file or use directory with multiple files (auto file find implemented, no recursion thought).

This application was written for request and don't have some important functionality like thread support so during conversion of large files (converting directory) application will stop responding. Check if HDD is used if Yes then application is working fine, just Ui freeze.
